ygData.subject: Re: A bit o help
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, the new mask is truely bard/rogue only.  No more wizards right cliking and getting dark elf look.  Brad even commented on the mask in his infamous Nerf
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, the new mask is truely bard/rogue only. No more wizards right
cliking and getting dark elf look. Brad even commented on the mask
in his infamous Nerf vs. Enhancement post.

>
> From: Jason Osborne <jasono@...>
>
> What do yo mean by "NEW mask?" Does the assassin drop a different mask than
> the Guise of the Deceiver now?
>
> -- Laena, Lvl 28 E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Joshua R. Moore [mailto:josh@...]
> Sent: Thursday, December 09, 1999 9:48 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] A bit o help
>
>
> From: "Joshua R. Moore" <josh@...>
>
> I have a boon to ask of ye, me friends.
> I have need of a better map to the ruins of lower Guk. The maps I have found
> from the many cartographers around fail to lead me true.
> Any help you may offer in this manner would be greatly appreciated.
> -Martyn
>
> [OOC: The maps out there that I have found fail to show the Assassin room. I
> would love to be able to get there, or near, to get a basalt Carapace to
> wear (and perhaps one of the new masks)
> I was in lower Guk much of last night, and both were up for free loot, but I
> could not find a guide to the assassin room. by the time I did find a guide
> (a few hours later), There were only 20 people in the zone, and bad things
> were everywhere. I did get greaves and gauntlets. Much better to wear than
> bronze]
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
> > Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@... with the subject submissions.
>
